home.title: Merge, group or combine your Strava activities - Sport Track Merger
home.description: Mobile app for Android and iOS designed to merge, group or duplicate your Strava activities (commutes, hiking, GPS errors, multi-day, indoor).
home.h1: Easily merge or group your Strava activities
home.h2: Sport Track Merger lets you combine multiple Strava sessions into a single activity, whether to group commutes, fix GPS splits or merge a week-long hike.
home.download_ios: Download Sport Track Merger on the App Store
home.download_android: Download Sport Track Merger on Google Play

head.title: Contact - Sport Track Merger
head.description: Contact the Sport Track Merger team by email or via social media. Fast support and open to suggestions.

contact.title: Contact Sport Track Merger
contact.description: Have a question, suggestion, or encountered an issue in the app? Feel free to contact us by email or via social networks.

discord.title: Join our Discord community
discord.description: Chat with other users and get real-time help
